wikipedia_page.main: Keith Edward Barber (1944 – 1 February 2017) was a professor of physical geography at the University of Southampton. Barber specialized in palaeoecology, landscape and climate change, and human impact throughout the Quaternary. He retired in 2009.

response: * Keith Barber (geographer) (1944–2017), British professor of physical geography at the University of Southampton
* Keith Barber, Green Party candidate in the 2003 Manitoba provincial election
